events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the software engineer role.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and found your software development experience aligns well with our requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm about the software engineer position in our company.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC with our senior developers.
You successfully completed the technical interview where your coding and problem-solving skills were well demonstrated.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11:00 UTC to discuss your alignment with our company culture.
You completed the HR interview successfully, showing strong interpersonal skills and cultural fit.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role including competitive benefits and salary.
Thank you for providing feedback on the offer; we appreciate your positive response and excitement to join our team.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you as a new member of the software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started and we have provided you with all the necessary resources to get you settled in your new role.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and you are welcomed fully as part of our engineering department.
